tc_game_config_files.description: Main configuration file. Will be merged to server.cfg before server starts.
tc_game_config_files.template: antihack.enabled ![antihackenabled] antihack.admincheat ![antihackadmincheat] gamemode.set ![gamemode] chat.enabled ![chatenabled] chat.serverlog ![serverlog] server.hostname "$[HostName]" server.secure ![secure] server.globalchat ![globalchat] server.pve ![pve] server.description "![description]" server.headerimage ![headerimage] server.url ![url] rcon.password $[RConPassword] $ipy<% if ThisService.Variables.GetValue("UseCustomMap") == "True": ReturnValue = "server.levelurl {}".format(ThisService.Variables.GetValue("levelurl")) else: ReturnValue = "server.level \"{}\"\nserver.seed {}\nserver.worldsize {}".format(ThisService.Variables.GetValue("level"), ThisService.Variables.GetValue("seed"), ThisService.Variables.GetValue('mapsize')) %> server.saveinterval 600 server.idlekick "10" server.idlekickmode "2" fps.limit 120

tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
# DO NOT EDIT THIS SCRIPT # DO NOT EDIT THIS SCRIPT # DO NOT EDIT THIS SCRIPT import clr clr.AddReference("TCAdmin.SDK") clr.AddReference("TCAdmin.Interfaces") clr.AddReference("TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK") from System import Environment, PlatformID, String from System.IO import Path, File, Directory from TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK.Objects import GameScript, ServiceEvent, Service from TCAdmin.Interfaces.Server import ServiceStatus from System.Text.RegularExpressions import Regex, RegexOptions, Match import calendar, datetime, subprocess
# Define a simple alias of ThisTaskStep.WriteLog since we will be using it a lot try: ThisTaskStep.WriteLog except NameError: WriteLog = Script.WriteToConsole else: WriteLog = ThisTaskStep.WriteLog
#Get the current date so we can see if today's date is equal to first_thursday now = datetime.datetime.now() today = str(now.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")) c = calendar.Calendar(firstweekday=calendar.SUNDAY) monthcal = c.monthdatescalendar(now.year, now.month) first_thursday = str([day for week in monthcal for day in week if day.weekday() == calendar.THURSDAY and day.month == now.month][0])
if first_thursday == today: #Stop the service before doing anything if this service is running. This is to prevent TCAdmin from stopping the server every time it runs (should only be stopped if dayToExecute is today). current_status = ThisService.Status.ServiceStatus if ThisService.Status.ServiceStatus == ServiceStatus.Running: WriteLog('Service is running. Stopping the service...') Service(ThisService.ServiceId).Stop()
#Call the variables and execute the script ThisService.Variables["wipemap"] ThisService.Variables["wipemapnewseed"] ThisService.Variables["wipeplayers"] ThisService.Variables["WipeFiles"] ThisService.Variables["CustomSeeds"] ThisService.Variables['RemoveUsedSeed'] ThisService.Variables["PerformSteamUpdate"] Script.Execute(ThisGame.GameId, 8)
#Start service again if service was started before executing the script. if current_status == ServiceStatus.Running: WriteLog('Starting service...') Service(ThisService.ServiceId).Start() WriteLog('Service was started successfully.') else: WriteLog('[Rust Wipe Script] Not wiping server as today is not the first Thursday of the month')

import os from collections import OrderedDict
settings_file = os.path.join(ThisService_RootDirectory, 'server', 'my_server_identity', 'cfg', 'settings.cfg') additional_settings_file = os.path.join(ThisService_RootDirectory, 'server', 'my_server_identity', 'cfg', 'additionalsettings.cfg') files = [settings_file, additional_settings_file]
def write_servercfg(files): server_cfg_file = os.path.join(ThisService_RootDirectory, 'server', 'my_server_identity', 'cfg', 'server.cfg') merge_files = [] #Remove conf_file from list if it doesn't exists. We have to go through the list in reverse since remove() will alter the list's length for conf_file in files[::-1]: if not os.path.isfile(conf_file): files.remove(conf_file)
if files: settings = [] #Get contents of settings files for f in files: with open(f, 'r') as orig_file: lines = orig_file.readlines() if "\n" not in lines[-1]: #Add newline to last line so merging 2nd file doesn't start on same line as last line from 1st file lines[-1] = lines[-1] + "\n" for line in lines: settings.append(line)
#Remove duplicates settings = list(OrderedDict.fromkeys(settings))
#Add warning to the top of server.cfg settings[0] = "#Do not update this file manually. Use settings.cfg or additionalsettings.cfg instead.\n{}".format(settings[0])
#Remove newline on last line settings[-1] = settings[-1].replace("\n", "")
#Write contents of both files to main settings file with open(server_cfg_file, 'w') as outfile: for line in settings: outfile.write(line)
write_servercfg(files)

import clr clr.AddReference('TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK') clr.AddReference('TCAdmin.SDK') from TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK.Objects import Service from TCAdmin.SDK.Misc.Linux import SetDirectoryOwnerAutoDetect from shutil import move from os.path import isfile, join, isdir from os import makedirs from System import Environment, PlatformID
ThisService = Service(ThisService_ServiceId)
#Check if logdir exists logdir = join(ThisService_RootDirectory, 'logs') if not isdir(logdir): makedirs(logdir) if Environment.OSVersion.Platform == PlatformID.Unix : SetDirectoryOwnerAutoDetect(logdir, False)
#Check if latest.log exists logfile = join(logdir, 'latest.log')
#Move the logfile if isfile(logfile): last_started = ThisService.StartTime time_format = '{}-{}-{}__{}-{}-{}'.format(last_started.Year, last_started.Month, last_started.Day, last_started.Hour, last_started.Minute, last_started.Second) new_logfile_name = 'server_{}.log'.format(time_format) move(logfile, join(logdir, new_logfile_name))

tc_game_scripts.description: Set default priority to idle and random core
tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
import random import clr import System from System import Environment from System.Diagnostics import ProcessPriorityClass
# Returns random affinity for x cores def GetRandomAffinity(): StartCores = 3 #Change the number to how many cores the service should start with
# Get the number of cores available on the system cores = int(Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable("NUMBER_OF_PROCESSORS")) - 1
# Initiate a list that we're gonna use. Each core will be added to the list like [1, 2, 3, 4...]. We're gonna reverse this list later core_list = [] for i in xrange(cores): i = i+1 core_list.append(i)
# Reverse the list. On a system with 8 cores, we're gonna end up with [8, 7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1]. core_list.reverse()
# Select 'StartCores' random cores random_cores = random.sample(core_list, StartCores)
number = "" # Iterate through the list of cores and get binary number - if we pass a number from random_cores, we add 1 number variable. If not, we add 0. # Example with 8 cores with 3 and 5 as random cores: 00010100 # When we have the binary number, we need to convert it to dec and return this. 00010100 will return 20 - and this is CPU 3 and 5. for i in core_list: if i in random_cores: number += "1" else: number += "0" dec = int(number, 2) return dec
# Set temporary affinity and priority used while the game server is starting ThisServiceController.ServiceConfig["Service.OriginalPriority"]=ThisServiceController.ServiceConfig["Service.Priority"] ThisServiceController.ServiceConfig["Service.Priority"] = ProcessPriorityClass.Idle ThisServiceController.ServiceConfig["Service.OriginalAffinity"]=ThisServiceController.ServiceConfig["Service.Affinity"] ThisServiceController.ServiceConfig["Service.Affinity"] = GetRandomAffinity()
if ThisServiceController.ServiceConfig["Service.OriginalAffinity"] == 0: ThisServiceController.ServiceConfig["Service.OriginalAffinity"] = ThisServiceController.GetAffinityOfAllProcessors()

tc_game_scripts.description: Set priority and affinity back to normal
tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
#import threading from multiprocessing.pool import ThreadPool
#Used to find the value of the Log File setting import clr clr.AddReference('TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK') from TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK.Objects import Service, Game
ThisService = Service(ThisService_ServiceId) ThisGame = Game(ThisService.GameId)
def WaitForStartupComplete(o): rootfolder = o[0] serviceid = o[1] tcafolder = o[2] controller = o[3] import sys import clr import System from System import String, IntPtr, Exception from System.IO import File, Path from System.Diagnostics import Process from System.Threading import Thread, ThreadStart, ParameterizedThreadStart from TCAdmin.SDK import UnhandledExceptionManager
# An uncaught exception in a separate ironpython thread will cause a monitor/service manager crash try : # Wait until the Rust log has "Server startup complete" powershell = Process.Start("powershell.exe", String.Format("Get-Content '{0}{1}' -wait | ? {{ $_ -match 'Server startup complete' }} | % {{ exit }}", rootfolder, ThisGame.WebConsole.LogFile))
# Create powershell pid file so we can kill if needed pspid=Path.Combine(rootfolder, "..", String.Format("{0}_ps.pid", serviceid)); with File.CreateText(pspid) as pidfile : pidfile.Write(powershell.Id)
powershell.WaitForExit()
# We don't need the powershell pid file anymore if File.Exists(pspid) : File.Delete(pspid)
# Set affinity and priority back to normal controller.ServiceConfig["Service.Priority"]= controller.ServiceConfig["Service.OriginalPriority"] controller.ServiceConfig["Service.Affinity"] = controller.ServiceConfig["Service.OriginalAffinity"]
# Get all processes for this service and set priority and affinity pids = controller.GetAllProcesses(1 == 0) for pid in pids: p = Process.GetProcessById(pid) p.PriorityClass = controller.ServiceConfig["Service.Priority"] p.ProcessorAffinity = IntPtr(controller.ServiceConfig["Service.Affinity"]) except Exception as ex: File.AppendAllText(Path.Combine(tcafolder, "Logs", "ServiceManager", "console.log"), String.Format("Rust AfterStart script error: {0}\n", ex.ToString())) pass
#Wait for server to start in a different thread so start command doesn't hang ThreadPool(1).imap_unordered(WaitForStartupComplete, [[ThisService_RootDirectory, ThisService_ServiceId, TCAdminFolder, ThisServiceController]])

tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
import clr clr.AddReference("TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK") clr.AddReference("TCAdmin.Interfaces")
from System.IO import File, Path from System.Text.RegularExpressions import Regex, RegexOptions from System import Environment, PlatformID, String from TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK import rconClient, RCONGameType from TCAdmin.Interfaces.Server import ServiceStatus
cfgfile = Path.Combine(ThisService_RootDirectory, String.Format("server/my_server_identity/cfg/server.cfg"))
pattern="rcon.password[ \t]*[ \t]*[\"]?(?<rconpassword>([^\"\r\n])*)[\"]?" filecontents = File.ReadAllText(cfgfile) match = Regex.Match(filecontents, pattern, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase)
if match.Success: rconpass = match.Groups["rconpassword"].Value Script.WriteToConsole(String.Format("RCon password is: {0}", rconpass)) rconclient=rconClient() rconclient.TimeOut=10000 rconclient.GameType = RCONGameType.RustWeb rconclient.Server = ThisService_IpAddress rconclient.Port = ThisService_RConPort Script.WriteToConsole("Shutting down server...") rconclient.Send(None, None, rconpass, "quit", True) Script.WriteToConsole(String.Format("RCon Response: {0}", rconclient.ReadResponse())) Script.WriteToConsole("Done.")

tc_game_scripts.description: This will wipe selected files on your server
tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
import clr, glob, subprocess clr.AddReference("TCAdmin.SDK") clr.AddReference('TCAdmin.TaskScheduler.SDK') clr.AddReference("TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK") from TCAdmin.TaskScheduler.SDK.Objects import Task, RecurringTask, RecurringStep from TCAdmin.SDK.Database import XmlField from TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK.Objects import GameScript, ServiceEvent, GameSteamConfig from System.IO import Path, File, Directory from System import Environment, PlatformID, Array from System.Text.RegularExpressions import Regex, RegexOptions, Match
#Check if run as a scheduled task. We check if ThisTaskStep.WriteLog is callable. If it is, set WriteLog = ThisTaskStep.WriteLog. If it isn't, set WriteLog = Script.WriteToConsole. try: ThisTaskStep.WriteLog except NameError: WriteLog = Script.WriteToConsole else: WriteLog = ThisTaskStep.WriteLog
def run_command(cmd): process = subprocess.Popen(cmd, stdout=subprocess.PIPE) while True: output = process.stdout.readline() if output == '' and process.poll() is not None: break if output: WriteLog(output.strip()) rc = process.poll() return rc
#Specify order of fields ThisService.Variables["wipemap"] ThisService.Variables["wipemapnewseed"] ThisService.Variables["wipeplayers"] ThisService.Variables["WipeFiles"] ThisService.Variables["CustomSeeds"] ThisService.Variables['RemoveUsedSeed']
#Run Steam Update if selected if ThisService.Variables["PerformSteamUpdate"] == "true": try: #Set Steam config steamconfig = GameSteamConfig(ThisGame.GameId) validate = 'validate' if steamconfig.Validate == True else '' WriteLog('[Starting] Update Server') #Run 'BeforeSteamUpdate' scripts utility = ThisService.GetScriptUtility() GameScript.ExecuteEventScripts(utility.ScriptEngineManager, ServiceEvent.BeforeSteamUpdate, ThisGame.Scripts)
#Execute a Steam Update. This has to be done manually. if Environment.OSVersion.Platform == PlatformID.Win32NT: cmd = [TCAdminFolder+'\\Monitor\\Tools\\SteamCmd\\steamcmd.exe', '+force_install_dir ' + ThisService.RootDirectory, '+login ' + steamconfig.SteamAcount, '+app_update ' + steamconfig.SteamGameType, validate, '+quit'] else: cmd = [TCAdminFolder+'/Monitor/Tools/SteamCmd/steamcmd.sh', '+force_install_dir ' + ThisService.RootDirectory, '+login ' + steamconfig.SteamAcount, '+app_update ' + steamconfig.SteamGameType, validate, '+quit']
run_command(cmd) WriteLog('[Complete] Update Server') WriteLog('')
#Run 'AfterSteamUpdate' scripts GameScript.ExecuteEventScripts(utility.ScriptEngineManager, ServiceEvent.AfterSteamUpdate, ThisGame.Scripts) #Steam Update Complete except Exception, e: WriteLog('Something went wrong during Steam Update. Error: {}'.format(e)) WriteLog('')
if ThisService.Variables["wipemap"] == "true": WriteLog('[Starting] Wipe Map') files = Directory.GetFiles(Path.Combine(ThisService.RootDirectory, 'server', 'my_server_identity'), '*.sav*') + Directory.GetFiles(Path.Combine(ThisService.RootDirectory, 'server', 'my_server_identity'), '*.map*') for f in files: try: File.Delete(f) WriteLog('Deleted savefile ' + f) except IOError, e: WriteLog('Could not delete %s, error was: %s' % (f, e)) WriteLog('[Complete] Wipe Map') WriteLog('')
conffile = Path.Combine(ThisService.RootDirectory, "server", "my_server_identity", "cfg", "settings.cfg")
if ThisService.Variables["wipemapnewseed"] == "true": WriteLog('[Starting] New Seed') WriteLog('Specifying a new seed') import random pattern="server.seed[ \t]*(?<oldseed>-?[0-9, \t]*)" filecontents = File.ReadAllText(conffile) match = Regex.Match(filecontents, pattern, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) oldseed = str(match.Groups["oldseed"].Value) newseed = str(random.randint(-2147483647,2147483647)) #Generate a new seed if old seed is the same as the generated seed while oldseed == newseed: newseed = str(random.randint(-2147483647,2147483647)) WriteLog('New seed is '+newseed) WriteLog('[Complete] New Seed') WriteLog('') import fileinput for line in fileinput.input(conffile, inplace=True): print line.replace('server.seed ' + oldseed, 'server.seed ' + newseed),
if ThisService.Variables["wipeplayers"] == "true": WriteLog('[Starting] Wipe Playerdata and Blueprints') userdata_folder = Path.Combine(ThisService.RootDirectory, 'userdata') files_to_delete = Directory.GetFiles(Path.Combine(ThisService.RootDirectory, 'server', 'my_server_identity'), '*.db*') #delete .db and .db-journal if Directory.Exists(userdata_folder): try: Directory.Delete(userdata_folder, True) WriteLog('Userdata wiped') except IOError, e: WriteLog('Could not delete %s, error was: %s' % (userdata_folder, e)) for f in files_to_delete: try: File.Delete(f) WriteLog('File '+f+' was deleted successfully') except IOError, e: WriteLog('Could not delete %s, error was: %s' % (f, e)) WriteLog('') WriteLog('[Complete] Wipe Playerdata and Blueprints') WriteLog('')
#Wipe specified folders and files wipe_files = ThisService.Variables['WipeFiles'] if wipe_files != '': WriteLog('[Starting] Wipe Additional Files/Folders') for i in wipe_files.splitlines(): if i.endswith('/') and Directory.Exists(Path.Combine(ThisService.RootDirectory, i)): #folder try: Directory.Delete(Path.Combine(ThisService.RootDirectory, i), True) WriteLog('Deleted folder {}'.format(i)) except IOError, e: WriteLog('Could not delete folder {}'.format(i)) WriteLog('') elif not i.endswith('/'): #file if '*' in i: fileList = glob.glob(Path.Combine(ThisService.RootDirectory, i)) for filePath in fileList: if File.Exists(Path.Combine(ThisService.RootDirectory, filePath)): try: WriteLog('Deleting {}'.format(filePath)) File.Delete(Path.Combine(ThisService.RootDirectory, filePath)) WriteLog('Deleted fil {}'.format(filePath)) except IOError, e: WriteLog('Could not delete file {}'.format(filePath)) WriteLog('') else: if File.Exists(Path.Combine(ThisService.RootDirectory, i)): try: File.Delete(Path.Combine(ThisService.RootDirectory, i)) WriteLog('Deleted file {}'.format(i)) except IOError, e: WriteLog('Could not delete file {}'.format(i)) WriteLog('[Complete] Wipe Additional Files/Folders') WriteLog('')
#Replace seed custom_seeds = ThisService.Variables['CustomSeeds'] if custom_seeds != '': WriteLog('[Starting] Replacing Seed') seeds = [] for seed in custom_seeds.splitlines(): seeds.append(seed) import random pattern="server.seed[ \t]*(?<oldseed>-?[0-9, \t]*)" filecontents = File.ReadAllText(conffile) match = Regex.Match(filecontents, pattern, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) oldseed = str(match.Groups["oldseed"].Value) newseed = str(random.choice(seeds)) if ThisService.Variables['RemoveUsedSeed'] == 'True': seeds.remove(newseed) updated_seeds = "\n".join(seeds) if 'ThisTaskStep' in globals(): ThisTask = Task(ThisTaskStep.Arguments.TaskId) ThisRecurringTask = RecurringTask(ThisTask.RecurringTaskId) ThisRecurringStep = ThisRecurringTask.Steps[0] RecurringStepArguments = XmlField(ThisRecurringStep.Arguments) StepVariables = XmlField(RecurringStepArguments["ScheduledScript.Variables"]); StepVariables["CustomSeeds"] = updated_seeds RecurringStepArguments["ScheduledScript.Variables"] = StepVariables.ToString() ThisRecurringStep.Arguments = RecurringStepArguments.ToString() ThisRecurringTask.Steps = Array[RecurringStep]([ThisRecurringStep]) ThisRecurringTask.Save()
if ':' in newseed: newsize = newseed.split(':')[1] newseed = newseed.split(':')[0] WriteLog('Setting new seed. Was {}, now {}'.format(oldseed, newseed)) pattern="server.worldsize[ \t]*(?<oldsize>-?[0-9, \t]*)" match = Regex.Match(filecontents, pattern, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) oldsize = str(match.Groups["oldsize"].Value) WriteLog('Setting new world size. Was {}, now {}'.format(oldsize, newsize)) ThisService.Variables['mapsize'] = newsize
ThisService.Variables['CustomSeeds'] = "{}".format("\n".join(seeds[:]))
import fileinput for line in fileinput.input(conffile, inplace=True): line = line.replace('server.seed ' + oldseed, 'server.seed ' + newseed) if 'oldsize' in locals(): line = line.replace('server.worldsize ' + oldsize, 'server.worldsize ' + newsize) print line,
ThisService.Variables['seed'] = newseed WriteLog('[Complete] Replacing Seed') WriteLog('')
WriteLog('The task completed successfully') ThisService.Configure(); ThisService.Save();

tc_game_scripts.custom_prompt: Are you sure you want to wipe your map? This action can't be reverted!

tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
import clr clr.AddReference('System.IO.Compression.FileSystem') clr.AddReference("TCAdmin.SDK") clr.AddReference("TCAdmin.Interfaces") clr.AddReference("TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK") from System import Environment, PlatformID from System.IO import Directory, File from TCAdmin.SDK.Misc import WebClient from TCAdmin.SDK.Misc import CompressionTools from TCAdmin.Interfaces.Server import ServiceStatus from TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK.Objects import Service
#Check if run as a scheduled task. We check if ThisTaskStep.WriteLog is callable. If it is, set WriteLog = ThisTaskStep.WriteLog. If it isn't, set WriteLog = WriteLog. try: ThisTaskStep.WriteLog except NameError: WriteLog = Script.WriteToConsole else: WriteLog = ThisTaskStep.WriteLog
c=CompressionTools() WriteLog('Checking if uMod is installed...') # Check if uMod is installed if Directory.Exists(ThisService.RootDirectory + 'oxide'): if File.Exists(ThisService.RootDirectory + 'Oxide.Rust.zip'): File.Delete(ThisService.RootDirectory + 'Oxide.Rust.zip')
WriteLog('Found uMod installation... Updating uMod.') url = 'https://umod.org/games/rust/download' if Environment.OSVersion.Platform == PlatformID.Win32NT else 'https://umod.org/games/rust/download/develop' if ThisService.Variables['branch'] == 'staging': WriteLog('Staging branch detected') url = 'https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/oxidemod/oxide-rust/artifacts/Oxide.Rust-staging.zip?pr=false&branch=staging' if Environment.OSVersion.Platform == PlatformID.Win32NT else 'https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/oxidemod/oxide-rust/artifacts/Oxide.Rust-linux-staging.zip?pr=false&branch=staging' fileName = ThisService.RootDirectory + "Oxide.Rust.zip" wc = WebClient() WriteLog("Downloading File " + fileName + " from " + url +"...\n\n") wc.DownloadFile(url,fileName)
if File.Exists(ThisService.RootDirectory + 'Oxide.Rust.zip'): current_status = ThisService.Status.ServiceStatus if current_status == ServiceStatus.Running: WriteLog('Stopping the service.') Service(ThisService.ServiceId).Stop() c.Decompress(ThisService.RootDirectory + "Oxide.Rust.zip", ThisService.RootDirectory) File.Delete(ThisService.RootDirectory + 'Oxide.Rust.zip') else: WriteLog('uMod not installed.')

tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
import clr import System clr.AddReference("TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK") clr.AddReference("System.Web") from System import String from System.Web import HttpUtility from System.Text.RegularExpressions import Regex from TCAdmin.GameHosting.SDK.GameMonitor import ServerQuery
querydata=ThisServer.GameAdminService.GetQueryResult("a2sutf8",ThisService.IpAddress, ThisService.QueryPort, ThisService.RootDirectory, ThisService.ServiceId) results=ServerQuery.GetQueryResults(querydata)
XmlFormat="<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?><qstat><server type=\"CUSTOM\" address=\"{0}:{1}\" status=\"{2}\"><hostname>{0}:{1}</hostname><name>{3}</name><gametype>{4}</gametype><map>{5}</map><numplayers>{6}</numplayers><maxplayers>{7}</maxplayers><numspectators>0</numspectators><maxspectators>0</maxspectators><ping>0</ping><retries>0</retries><rules>{8}</rules><players>{9}</players></server></qstat>" Status="UP" Name=HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(results.Name) GameType=results.GameType Map=results.Map
Rules="" for rule in results.Rules: Rules=Rules+String.Format("<rule name=\"{0}\">{1}</rule>", rule.Key, HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(rule.Value))
Players="" for player in results.Players: Players=Players+String.Format("<player><name>{0}</name><ping>{1}</ping><score>{2}</score></player>", HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(player.Name), player.Ping, player.Score)
NumPlayers=results.NumPlayers MaxPlayers=results.MaxPlayers
if results.Rules.ContainsKey("game_tag") : match = Regex.Match(results.Rules["game_tag"], "cp(\d*)") if match.Success : NumPlayers = match.Value.Substring(2) match = Regex.Match(results.Rules["game_tag"], "mp(\d*)") if match.Success : MaxPlayers = match.Value.Substring(2)
ReturnValue=String.Format(XmlFormat, ThisService.IpAddress, ThisService.QueryPort, Status, Name, GameType, Map, NumPlayers, MaxPlayers, Rules, Players)

tc_game_variables_config.description:
Each file and folder should be on a separate line. Paths are relative to the service's root directory. Wildcards (*) are supported for files.
Please note: Folders should include a trailing slash.
Deleting a folder will also delete any files and subfolders inside.

Example:
logs/
log.txt
userdata/*.sav

tc_game_variables_config.description:
Each item must be on a separate line.
Once a seed (and possible world size) has been used, it will be removed from the list.
A seed can be combined with a world size with the following syntax: seed:size
Example:
1234567890:3500
89714174
1247417593
